data.name: HowToReachContent
data.value:
By Rail :- The nearest railway station is Baidyanath Dham (Deoghar) which is a terminal station of a 7 km branch line originating at Jasidih Jn. On the Howrah-Delhi main line. Apart from local trains on the branch line trekkers (type of jeep) taking in passengers on a per person fare basis and auto rickshaws are available. Auto-Rickshaws are available frequently just outside the Jasidih railway station. They charge Rs 8 per person in a shared auto and up to Rs 60 in a reserved auto. However, due to recent incident of falling of the road bridge that connects Jasidih to Deoghar, the auto rickshaws take alternate longer route thus charge about Rs.15 per person and up to Rs 100 in reserved. The best means to get to deoghar is the local up-down train available every few hours at Jasidih Railway station on Platform No. 4

By Road - Deoghar is approachable from - Kolkata 373 km, Giridih 60 km, Patna 281 km, Dumka 67 km, Madhupur 30km, Ranchi 250 km, Shimultala 53 km and other places.

Note: Regular buses are available from surrounding towns.

data.name: PlaceToVisitContent
data.value:
1. Shiv Ganga Pond: It is located in north of Baidyanath Dham Temple. Devotee’s take bath before worship almighty Baba Baidyanath.

2. Nandan Pahar / hill – It is located at 3 Km west from Baidyanath Dham Temple. Here a beautiful park is present for entertainment for children as wel as their parents / guardians.

3. Trikut Hill / Pahar – It is located 18 Km East from Baidyanath Dham Temple. It have its own Natural beauty along with Rope-Way for entertainment.

4. Tapowan - It is located 9 Km East from Baidyanath Dham Temple. And Holi Place of Maharishi Balanand Swami.

5. Naulakha Mandir - It is located at 3 Km South-East from Baidyanath Dham Temple. Here Famous Temple Of Radha–Krishna is Present was build earlier.

6. Nav Durga Mandir - It is located at 3 Km South from Baidyanath Dham Temple. Here Famous Temple of Maa Durga is Present. Here The Nine forms Of Maa Durga Is Printed.

7. Pagal Baba Mandir - It is located 9 Km West from Baidyanath Dham Temple and 2 Km from Jasidih Railway Station.

8. Harila Jori - It is located at 3 Km North from Baidyanath Dham Temple.

9. Kali Dham, Pathrol - 53 km on bus route towards Madhupur via Sarath. Beautiful temple with nine more beautiful temples around the Main Kali Temple which was built by Raja Dig Vijay Singh, 6 to 7 centuries ago.

10. Basakinath Temple (42 km) :- Famous for Shiva Temple

11. Muloti (Village of temples, Near Dumka) - about 80 km

12. Massanjore Dam - 98 km.

13. Rikhiya Ashram - 7 Km south from Baidyanath Dham Temple

14. Prabhu Jagadbandhu Ashrama - 4 km from Deoghar, on the way to Tapovan, near Charki Pahari crossing - for short stay in a cool, pristine environment with monks and other ashramiks.

15. Ramakrishna Mission Vidyapith

16. Jain Mandir - 1/2 Km

17. Tara Pith Mandir (One of Shakti Pitha) - 125 Km

18. Aarogya Bhawan - 7 Km

19. Pathrol Kali mandir - 40 Km

data.name: PlaceToVisitDeoghar
data.value: देवघर में यात्रा करने के लिए जगह
